name: Robot Testing Grounds
description:
Welcome to Robot Testing Grounds, where the latest artificial intelligence prototype robots are deployed to test their problem solving abilities and adaptability. How far has AI come? Can the latest prototype prove adaptable enough to make it through the course or will it fail like all the rest? 

Robot Testing Grounds is a small one level puzzle game that I built as a solo project, focusing on a few very basic mechanics that are taught without explicit teaching, introducing concepts incrementally.
